gating_questions.question: Have you experienced visual loss in this episode?
gating_questions.field_description: Is vision loss or reduced acuity present in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Are you experiencing any problems with your colour vision?
gating_questions.field_description: Are there color perception problems in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Are you experiencing shimmering arcs, zig zags, or flashing lights?
gating_questions.field_description: Are there positive visual phenomena in this episode (shimmering arcs, flashing lights, zigzags)

gating_questions.question: Do you have double vision (diplopia)?
gating_questions.field_description: Is there diplopia (double vision) in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Do you feel dizzy or have vertigo?
gating_questions.field_description: Is there dizziness in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Are you experiencing any visual hallucinations?
gating_questions.field_label: Are hallucinations present in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Are you experiencing a headache?
gating_questions.field_label: Is headache present in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Do you have eye pain?
gating_questions.field_label: Is eye pain present in this episode?

gating_questions.question: Any change in the appearance of your eyes or around your eyes? For example redness, rashes, changes in your pupils, discharge, eyelid problems?
gating_questions.field_label: Are there changes in the appearance of the eyes or around the eyes in this episode? Include redness, rashes, changes in your pupils, discharge, eyelid problems

healthcare_contacts.question: For this episode, did you have any contact with a healthcare professional?
healthcare_contacts.field_description: Was there a healthcare contact for this episode

healthcare_contacts.question: Did you have any investigations or receive any treatments? Please could you list them.
healthcare_contacts.comment: Response Parser will separate investigations from treatments
healthcare_contacts.field_description: List the healthcare contacts and investigations

other_symptoms.question: Any other associated symptoms that you haven't mentioned?
other_symptoms.field_description: Other symptoms associated with this episode.  Exclude visual loss, colour perception problems, positive visual phenomena, double vision, headaches, eye pain or changes in appearance of the eye or around the eye

functional_impact.question: How has this episode affected you?
functional_impact.field_description: How this episode affects daily life. Impact on daily activities, work, driving, etc.

questions.question: Can I ask if the vision is affected in one eye or both?
questions.field_description: Is vision affected in one eye or both?

questions.question: Which eye is affected?
questions.field_description: Which eye is affected by visual loss. Only extract if one eye is affected, not if both eyes are affected

questions.question: Were both eyes affected at the same time, or did one start first?
questions.comment: If sequential = bilateral_monocular pattern; if simultaneous = true binocular
questions.field_description: Were the eyes affected simultaneously or sequentially. Only extract if both eyes are affected, not if one eye is affected

questions.question: And can you describe which part of the field of vision is affected?
questions.field_description: Which part of visual field is affected e.g. whole field, upper, lower, inner, outer, left or right, quadrant, bitemporal, binasal

questions.question: At its worst, in the affected area, how much could you see?
questions.field_description: Was the visual loss partial or total

questions.question: Could you describe what you could or couldn't see? For example, could you read fine print, count fingers, see hand movements?
questions.field_description: Detailed acuity description

questions.question: When did this first start?
questions.field_description: When vision loss first appeared (for recurrent patterns)

questions.question: How quickly did it develop?
questions.field_description: visual loss onset speed

questions.question: Is it constant or does it come and go?

definitions.transient: came on once, then resolved completely

questions.field_description: Overall temporal pattern of vision loss

questions.question: How long does each flare-up last?
questions.field_description: How long each flare-up typically lasts (for intermittent patterns)

questions.question: How often do you get these flare-ups?
questions.field_description: Time between flare-ups (for intermittent patterns)

questions.question: Is there still visual loss between flare-ups?
questions.field_description: Whether there is still visual loss between flare-ups

questions.question: Is there still any visual loss between flare-ups? And if so, do you know what the acuity is like in the interval?
questions.field_description: Acuity during the intervals

questions.question: After it started, did it keep getting worse?
questions.field_description: Did vision loss continue worsening after onset?

questions.question: Was it still worsening after 2 weeks?
questions.field_description: Was the visual loss still getting worse 2 weeks after the onset (only extract if visual loss carried on getting worse after onset)

questions.question: And at any point did it start to improve?
questions.field_description: Did the vision loss improve after it first started

questions.question: Did the vision loss completely resolve at the end of this episode?
questions.field_description: Has the vision loss completely resolved? Asked if visual_loss_present is true.

questions.question: Do you ever have brief blackouts in vision when you look around?
questions.field_description: Brief blackouts when looking around (partial monocular loss)

questions.question: Is anything specific missing from your vision, or are you having difficulty recognising things, for example, certain things, people, or faces?
questions.field_description: Is there is visual agnosia in this episode (difficulty recognising things despite being able to see them)

questions.question: Can you describe it to me in more detail?
questions.field_description: Only extract if visual agnosia present.  Description of the agnosia

questions.question: When did this start?
questions.field_description: When color perception problems first appeared

questions.question: Is the colour problem constant or does it come and go?
questions.field_description: Temporal pattern of color perception problems

questions.question: Is the loss of colour just in one eye, or in both?
questions.field_description: Is there colour perception loss in one eye or both eyes

questions.question: Which eye is affected?
questions.field_description: Which eye is affected (only extract if cp_single_eye is 'single')

questions.question: Were both eyes affected at the same time, or did one start first?
questions.field_description: Only extract if both eyes affected.  Did the colour perception loss occur simultaneously or sequentially

questions.question: Is the loss of colour in one part of your field of vision, for example the left side of your vision or the upper half of your vision?
questions.field_description: Which part of visual field is affected e.g. whole field, upper, lower, inner, outer, left or right, quadrant, bitemporal, binasal

questions.question: Are any particular colours affected (e.g. red desaturation)?
questions.field_description: Are any particular colours affected (e.g. red desaturation)

questions.question: Has the colour problem completely resolved since it started?
questions.field_description: Have the color perception problems completely resolved? Asked if cp_present is true.

questions.question: Can you describe these visual phenomena?
questions.field_description: Description of visual phenomena such as flashing lights, wavy lines, shimmering arcs

questions.question: When did this start?
questions.field_description: When visual phenomena first appeared

questions.question: Are they constant or does they come and go?
questions.field_description: Temporal pattern of visual phenomena

questions.question: Is this happening in one eye, or in both?
questions.field_description: Are there visual phenomena in one eye or both eyes

questions.question: Which eye is affected?
questions.comment: Follow-up to specify which eye - only asked if vp_single_eye is 'single'
questions.field_description: Which eye is affected (only asked if vp_single_eye is 'single')

questions.question: Were both eyes affected at the same time, or did one start first?
questions.comment: If sequential = bilateral_monocular pattern; if simultaneous = true binocular
questions.field_description: Only extract if both eyes affected.  Did the visual phenomena occur simultaneously or sequentially

questions.question: How long do they last?
questions.field_description: visual phenomena duration

questions.question: Where in your field of vision do these occur?
questions.field_description: Where in the field of vision do the visual phenomena occur

questions.question: Are these phenomena ever followed by a headache?
questions.field_description: Are the visual phenomena followed by headache

questions.question: Have they completely resolved since they started?
questions.field_description: Have the visual phenomena completely resolved? Asked if vp_present is true.

questions.question: When did the double vision start?
questions.field_description: When diplopia first appeared

questions.question: Is the double vision constant or does it come and go?
questions.field_description: Temporal pattern of diplopia

questions.question: Does the double vision go away if you close one eye, or is it still there?
questions.field_description: Binocular if the double vision goes away when closing one eye, monocular if it is still there after closing one eye

questions.question: Is it worse in any gaze direction?
questions.field_description: Is the diplopia worse in any direction and if so, list the direction or directions

questions.question: Has the double vision completely resolved since it started?
questions.field_description: Has the diplopia completely resolved? Asked if dp_present is true.

questions.question: How would you describe the dizziness?
questions.field_description: Description of dizziness

questions.question: Would you say there was any sensation of the world spinning or room moving around?
questions.field_description: Was there a sense of the world spinning or room moving (vertigo)

questions.question: Have you had issues with co-ordination when sat down? For example, have you struggled to use a pen or reach for a cup and pick it up
questions.field_description: Any issues with co-ordination when sat down? For example, struggling to use a pen or reaching for a cup to pick it up

questions.question: Any sensation of images or your eyes moving rapidly?
questions.field_description: Any sensation of images or eyes moving rapidly

questions.question: Can you describe what you are seeing?
questions.field_description: Description of hallucinations if present

questions.question: Have the hallucinations completely resolved?
questions.field_description: Have the hallucinations completely resolved? Extract if hallucinations_present is true.

questions.question: Could you describe what the headache felt like?
questions.field_description: Describe the character of the headache, e.g. stabbing, aching, band-like, pressure

questions.question: When did this headache start?
questions.field_description: When headache first appeared

questions.question: Is it episodic, coming and going, or persistent and constant?
questions.field_description: Overall temporal pattern of headache

questions.question: When you do get a flare-up, how long does it tend to last?
questions.field_description: How long each headache typically lasts (for intermittent patterns)

questions.question: And how often do these flare-ups happen?
questions.field_description: How often each flare-up lasts (for intermittent patterns)

questions.question: And how about at it's worst?  How would you rate the pain on a scale of 0-10?
questions.field_description: Worst headache severity experienced

questions.question: In between flare-ups, is there any residual headache? If so, how would you rate the pain on a scale of 0-10?
questions.field_description: Headache severity between flare-ups (0 if complete resolution)

questions.question: Where is the headache located?
questions.field_description: Where is the headache located

questions.question: Does it worsen with straining, like lifting heavy objects or pushing on the toilet?
questions.field_description: Does the headache worsen with straining

questions.question: Is it worse at any time of day, like morning or evening?
questions.field_description: Does the headache worsen at any time of day

questions.question: Have the headaches completely resolved?
questions.field_description: Has the headache completely resolved? Asked if h_present is true.

questions.question: When did the eye pain start?
questions.field_description: When eye pain first appeared

questions.question: Is it constant or does it come and go?
questions.field_description: Temporal pattern of eye pain

questions.question: Can I ask if there's pain in one eye or both?
questions.comment: Initial laterality question - if single, triggers ep_3. If both, triggers ep_4.
questions.field_description: Is the eye pain affecting one or both eyes?

questions.question: Which eye is affected?
questions.comment: Follow-up to specify which eye - only asked if ep_single_eye is 'single'
questions.field_description: Which side is it affecting? - Extract only if single eye pain

questions.question: Were both eyes affected at the same time, or did one start first?
questions.comment: If sequential = bilateral_monocular pattern; if simultaneous = true binocular
questions.field_description: Did it start in both eyes at the same time or one after the other. Extract only if affecting both eyes

questions.question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how severe is the pain?
questions.field_description: Severity of the eye pain

questions.question: Is the pain worse with eye movements?
questions.field_label: eye pain worse on eye movements
questions.field_description: Is the eye pain worse on eye movements

questions.question: Has the eye pain completely resolved since it started?
questions.field_description: Has the eye pain completely resolved? Asked if ep_present is true.

questions.question: Do you have a dry or gritty sensation, or feel like there's something in your eye?
questions.field_description: Is there a dry or gritty sensation in the eyes

questions.question: Did you notice any redness of the eyes?
questions.field_description: Was there any redness of the eyes

questions.question: Do you have any discharge?
questions.field_description: Was there any eye discharge

questions.question: Has one or both eyes begun to bulge (proptosis)?
questions.field_description: Was there any bulging of the eyes (proptosis)

questions.question: Is one of your eyelids drooping (ptosis)?
questions.field_description: Was there any drooping of the eyelids

questions.question: Have you noticed any changes in your pupils?
questions.field_description: Any changes in the pupils

questions.question: Do you have any rashes around your eyes?
questions.field_description: Did you have any rashes around the eyes

questions.question: Do your symptoms worsen with exercise or heat exposure?
questions.field_description: Did the symptoms worsen with exercise or heat exposure

questions.question: Do moving objects appear closer or further than they are?
questions.field_description: Did moving objects appear closer or further than they are

questions.question: Do you have scalp tenderness?
questions.field_description: Any scalp tenderness

questions.question: Do you have jaw pain when chewing (jaw claudication)?
questions.field_description: Any jaw pain when chewing (jaw claudication)

questions.question: Do you have pain in your shoulders or around your shoulder girdle?
questions.field_description: Any pain in shoulders or around shoulder girdle

questions.question: Have you noticed any change in your appearance, like your face, hands, or feet growing larger?
questions.field_description: Any any change in your appearance, like your face, hands, or feet growing larger

questions.question: Have you noticed any discharge from the nipples?
questions.field_description: Any discharge from the nipples

questions.question: Have you noticed any change in your menstrual periods?
questions.field_description: Any change in your menstrual periods

questions.question: Have you experienced erectile dysfunction?
questions.field_description: Any erectile dysfunction

questions.question: Have you noticed any breast growth or enlargement?
questions.field_description: Any breast growth or enlargement

questions.question: Do you find that you feel much hotter or colder than expected given the weather?
questions.field_description: Any heat or cold intolerance

questions.question: Do you have any dietary restrictions, digestive issues, or have you had stomach or gut surgery?
questions.field_description: Any dietary restrictions, digestive issues, or have you had stomach or gut surgery

questions.question: Are you taking any of these medications: ethambutol, amiodarone, methotrexate, trimethoprim, or regular antacids like omeprazole?
questions.field_description: Are you taking any of these medications: ethambutol, amiodarone, methotrexate, trimethoprim, or regular antacids like omeprazole

questions.question: Have you had any exposure to cats? Specifically, have you been scratched by a cat?
questions.field_description: Any exposure to cats?

questions.question: Are you having difficulty reading words despite being able to see the letters?
questions.field_description: Any difficulty reading words despite being able to see the letters

questions.question: If you spell out a word letter by letter, can you then recognise it?
questions.field_description: If you spell out a word letter by letter, can you then recognise it

questions.question: Have you had trouble recognizing people you know, like family members or friends?
questions.field_description: Any trouble recognizing people you know, like family members or friends

questions.question: If you hear their voice, can you then recognise them?
questions.field_label: b6 can recognise people by voice
questions.field_description: If you hear their voice, can you then recognise them

questions.question: Are you having trouble finding your way around places you know well, like your home or neighborhood?
questions.field_description: Any trouble finding your way around places you know well, like your home or neighborhood

questions.question: When you look at a busy scene, can you see the whole picture, or do you only see one thing at a time?
questions.field_description: When you look at a busy scene, can you see the whole picture, or do you only see one thing at a time

questions.question: If you watch water being poured, does it look frozen or static?
questions.field_description: If you watch water being poured, does it look frozen or static

questions.question: And if you watch a car going down the street, can you see it moving or does it seem to be far away and then suddenly closer?
questions.field_description: if you watch a car going down the street, can you see it moving or does it seem to be far away and then suddenly closer
